name: Line Crossing
description:
Afra finds herself in a very mysterious place after what she thought was a simple train ride to a place she dreaded. Is this a good thing or a bad thing? Who knows! ~Mysterious Train Adventure~ TEN ENDINGS! 

Built with blood, sweat, tears, Construct 2, during a 9 hour power outage, with the wrench.

Created for Ludum Dare 30.  I'm planning on updating later with artwork for separate endings and a real title screen. 

Ludum Dare 30 - Line Crossing

https://twitter.com/Lissaring
